amendment.description: To provide limitations on the authority of the President to modify trade agreements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1565, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 205.

action.text: Amendment SA 1565 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3407-3408; text: CR S3402) To provide limitations on the authority of the President to modify trade agreements.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1565, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 205.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1565, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 205.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1565 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 1502.
